content.text:
Refer to the figure <image 1>, which term describes a character who is in direct juxtaposition to another character and serves to highlight the characteristics of the other individual?

A. Protagonist
B. Round character
C. Character foil
D. Shape

C. Character foil

A character foil is a character who is in direct juxtaposition to another character and serves to highlight the characteristics of the other individual.
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
